FuncDef: This command binds a service to an existing Service Distribution Point (SDP).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the SDP identifier. Values-1 to 17407.
Specifies the virtual circuit identifier. Values-1 to 4294967295.
The encapsulation and pseudowire type for the spoke SDP. Values-ether-Ethernet pseudowire.. ParamDefault: Default- ether
